# Indonesian Classifier

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository tracks the version of code for Cosine Similarity analysis performed by Gede Primahadi W. Rajeg as part of a research project concerning Indonesian Classifier (lead author: Karlina Denistia, Ph.D.). See the main [Open Science Framework (OSF) repository](https://osf.io/zr29a/) for a more complete set of materials.
